Title: The National Parks: America's Best Idea
FullTitle: The National Parks: America's Best Idea (TV Series 2009–2009)
SortTitle: National Parks: America's Best Idea, The
Plot: The history of the U.S. National Parks system, including the initial ideas which led to the world's first national parks and the expansion of the system over 150 years.
Stars: Peter Coyote, William Cronon, Dayton Duncan
